gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Knicks 126, Hawks 120
gameRecap.excerpt: Led by Jalen Brunson's 31 points, five assists and eight 3pt. FG, the Knicks defeated the Hawks, 126-120. RJ Barrett added 26 points and six assists in the victory, while Trae Young tallied 18 points and 12 assists for the Hawks in the losing effort. The Knicks improve to 1-1 on the season, while the Hawks fall to 0-2.
